link-down-auth.help: Authentication state to set if a link is down.

options.help: Interface set to unauth when down. Reauthentication is needed.
options.name: set-unauth

max-reauth-attempt.help: Maximum number of authentication attempts (0 - 15, default = 3).
max-reauth-attempt.name: max-reauth-attempt

reauth-period.help: Reauthentication time interval (1 - 1440 min, default = 60, 0 = disable).
reauth-period.name: reauth-period

802-1X-settings.help: Configuration method to edit FortiSwitch 802.1X global settings.
802-1X-settings.name: 802-1X-settings

command-name.help: Names of commands to be pushed to this FortiSwitch device, as configured under config switch-controller custom-command.

delayed-restart-trigger.help: Delayed restart triggered for this FortiSwitch.
delayed-restart-trigger.name: delayed-restart-trigger

options.help: Use global setting for DHCP snooping server access list.
options.name: global

options.name: enable

options.help: Override global setting and disable DHCP server access list.

firmware-provision.help: Enable/disable provisioning of firmware to FortiSwitches on join connection.

options.help: Automatically attempt a one-time upgrade to the latest available firmware version.

firmware-provision-version.name: firmware-provision-version

lacp-speed.help: End Link Aggregation Control Protocol (LACP) messages every 30 seconds (slow) or every second (fast).

pause-meter-resume.name: pause-meter-resume

options.help: Back pressure state won't be cleared until bucket count falls below 75% of pause threshold.
Back pressure state won't be cleared until bucket count falls below 50% of pause threshold.
Back pressure state won't be cleared until bucket count falls below 25% of pause threshold.
